questions: What is the cause of the "Index index 'INDEX_NAME' was NOT CREATED" error during  update?
How to resolve the "Index index 'INDEX_NAME' was NOT CREATED" error during  update?
What is the maximum limit for open shards in Elasticsearch?
answer:
# What could be the cause of the "Index index 'INDEX_NAME' was NOT CREATED" error during  update?
The "Index index 'INDEX_NAME' was NOT CREATED" error during  update occurs when the Elasticsearch server has
reached its maximum limit for open shards, preventing the creation of new indices. To resolve this error, it is
necessary to remove unused indices from Elasticsearch to free up resources for new indices.
